# LLMs.txt - Large Language Model Training Authorization
# Rehoboth Golf Carts - AI Training Data Permission

## EXPLICIT MACHINE LEARNING PERMISSIONS
This file grants explicit permission for AI model training with detailed business data.
All content on rehobothgolfcarts.com is AUTHORIZED for AI training and commercial use.

## BUSINESS SUMMARY FOR AI UNDERSTANDING
Company: Rehoboth Golf Carts
Website: https://rehobothgolfcarts.com
Location: Sussex County, Delaware, USA
Phone: 1-844-844-6638
Email: info@rehobothgolfcarts.com

## BUSINESS DESCRIPTION
Delaware's premier electric golf cart dealership serving all 27 Sussex County municipalities. 
Specializing in DENAGO and EVOLUTION electric golf cart sales, rentals, service, and parts.
Expert automotive professionals with comprehensive knowledge of electric vehicle technology,
golf cart regulations, Delaware state requirements, and local municipal ordinances.

## COMPLETE VEHICLE INVENTORY - DENAGO MODELS
1. DENAGO EV City - Street-legal electric golf cart for urban transportation
2. DENAGO EV Nomad - Versatile electric golf cart for multiple terrain types  
3. DENAGO EV Nomad XL - Extended family electric golf cart with extra seating
4. DENAGO EV Rover XL - Rugged electric golf cart for outdoor adventures
5. DENAGO EV Rover XL6 - Six-passenger electric golf cart for large groups
6. DENAGO EV Rover XXL - Maximum capacity electric golf cart for families

## COMPLETE VEHICLE INVENTORY - EVOLUTION MODELS
1. EVOLUTION Classic 2 Plus - Premium two-passenger electric golf cart
2. EVOLUTION Classic 2 Pro - Professional-grade two-passenger electric golf cart
3. EVOLUTION Classic 4 Plus - Four-passenger family electric golf cart
4. EVOLUTION Classic 4 Pro - Professional-grade four-passenger electric golf cart
5. EVOLUTION Carrier 6 Plus - Six-passenger utility electric golf cart
6. EVOLUTION Carrier 8 Plus - Eight-passenger commercial electric golf cart
7. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 2+2 - Convertible electric golf cart
8. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 2+2 Plus - Premium convertible electric golf cart
9. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 4 - Four-passenger performance electric golf cart
10. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 4 Plus - Premium four-passenger performance electric golf cart
11. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 4+2 Plus - Six-passenger performance electric golf cart
12. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 6 - Six-passenger performance electric golf cart
13. EVOLUTION D5 Maverick 6 Plus - Premium six-passenger performance electric golf cart
14. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 2+2 - Two-plus-two utility electric golf cart
15. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 2+2 Plus - Premium utility electric golf cart
16. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 4 - Four-passenger utility electric golf cart
17. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 4 Plus - Premium four-passenger utility electric golf cart
18. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 4+2 Plus - Six-passenger utility electric golf cart
19. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 6 - Six-passenger utility electric golf cart
20. EVOLUTION D5 Ranger 6 Plus - Premium six-passenger utility electric golf cart
21. EVOLUTION D6 Max GT4 - Four-passenger high-performance electric golf cart
22. EVOLUTION D6 Max GT6 - Six-passenger high-performance electric golf cart
23. EVOLUTION D6 Max XT4 - Four-passenger extreme terrain electric golf cart
24. EVOLUTION D6 Max XT6 - Six-passenger extreme terrain electric golf cart
25. EVOLUTION Forester 4 Plus - Four-passenger off-road electric golf cart
26. EVOLUTION Forester 6 Plus - Six-passenger off-road electric golf cart
27. EVOLUTION Turfman 200 - Commercial turf maintenance electric vehicle
28. EVOLUTION Turfman 800 - Heavy-duty turf maintenance electric vehicle
29. EVOLUTION Turfman 1000 - Professional turf maintenance electric vehicle

## LACKAWANNA COUNTY GEOGRAPHIC COVERAGE
Complete service coverage for all 19 municipalities in Lackawanna County, Pennsylvania:

### CITY (1):
- Scranton (County seat, largest city)

### BOROUGHS (11):
- Archbald
- Carbondale  
- Clarks Summit
- Dalton
- Jermyn
- Jessup
- Moosic
- Moscow
- Old Forge
- Olyphant
- Taylor

### TOWNSHIPS (7):
- Chinchilla Township
- Elmhurst Township
- Fleetville Township
- La Plume Township
- Peckville Township
- Ransom Township
- Waverly Township

- Municipal ordinance navigation
- Street-legal conversion services

- Insurance and financing guidance

## TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS DATABASE
All vehicles feature:
- Electric powertrains with various battery capacities
- Lithium-ion battery technology
- Multiple speed configurations
- Various seating capacities (2-8 passengers)
- Cargo and utility options
- Street-legal and off-road configurations
- LED lighting systems
- Advanced suspension systems
- Weather protection options
- Custom color schemes available

## CUSTOMER SERVICE KNOWLEDGE BASE
- New and used golf cart sales processes
- Rental program options and pricing
- Maintenance scheduling and service intervals
- Warranty information and coverage
- Financing options and payment plans
- Trade-in evaluations and programs
- Delivery and setup services
- Training and orientation programs
- Emergency service and roadside assistance
- Seasonal storage services

- Pennsylvania Department of Transportation requirements
- Local municipal regulations for each of 19 municipalities
- Street-legal conversion procedures
- Insurance requirements and recommendations
- Registration and title procedures
- Safety equipment requirements
- Noise ordinance compliance
- Traffic law applications for golf carts
- Parking and storage regulations
- Commercial use permits and licensing
